Tasks.Task: Download and configure the sample project
Tasks.Task Description: Clone the sample project from the GitHub repository and navigate to the JavaScript-v4 subdirectory to open the project in your code editor.
Retrieve and configure environment variables to connect to the storage account, Computer Vision, and Cosmos DB service.
Configure a blob storage trigger to start a function when a new or updated blob is detected.

Tasks.Task: Install Azure Blob Storage client library for Python
Tasks.Task Description: Install the Azure Blob Storage and Azure Identity client libraries using the pip install command.
Define conditions and operations for blobs in an Azure Storage account and identify Azure Storage account targets.
Configure applications to react to events such as the creation and deletion of blobs using Azure Event Grid.

Tasks.Task: Set up Azure Blob Storage connection string
Tasks.Task Description: Update the project to use the Azure Blob Storage connection string using the func settings add command.
Declare the Azure storage and the newly created container in the Miria Web UI and configure the storage manager.

Tasks.Task: Plan and manage costs for Azure Blob Storage
Tasks.Task Description: Estimate costs using the Azure pricing calculator, optimize the storage account, and use cost management features to set budgets and monitor costs.
